title: Complete Python Tutorial for Beginners
description: Learn Python programming from basics to advanced concepts with practical examples. This comprehensive course covers variables, data types, loops, functions, OOP, and more.

title: JavaScript Full Course for Beginners
description: Complete JavaScript tutorial covering fundamentals, DOM manipulation, and modern ES6+ features. Perfect for absolute beginners starting web development.

title: React JS Full Course 2023
description: Build modern web applications with React.js including hooks, context API, and best practices. Learn component-based development and state management.

title: HTML & CSS Full Course
description: Learn web development fundamentals with HTML5 and CSS3 from scratch. Build responsive websites with modern design principles.

title: C Language Tutorial for Beginners
description: Master C programming language with hands-on examples and projects. Learn pointers, memory management, and data structures.

title: Node.js Full Course for Beginners
description: Complete Node.js tutorial covering Express.js, REST APIs, MongoDB integration, and authentication. Build full-stack applications.

title: Machine Learning Course - Python
description: Learn machine learning fundamentals with Python. Covers supervised learning, neural networks, and practical ML projects.

title: MongoDB Complete Tutorial
description: Master MongoDB database from basics to advanced. Learn CRUD operations, indexing, aggregation, and Atlas cloud deployment.

title: Data Science Full Course
description: Complete data science course covering Python, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, machine learning, and real-world projects.

title: Web Development Bootcamp 2023
description: Full-stack web development bootcamp. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and build complete projects.
